main.name: Rupayan Chakraborty
main.bio: Senior Backend Engineer with 4+ years of experience architecting scalable microservices, container orchestration systems, and high-performance APIs. Specialized in Python, FastAPI, Docker, and cloud infrastructure with a proven track record of building robust backend systems that handle millions of requests. Currently leading backend development for AI deployment platforms and blockchain protocols.
main.contactmessage: Let's discuss backend architecture, scalable systems, and engineering challenges!

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: Graduated with 8.11 DGPA. Specialized in systems programming, data structures, algorithms, and software architecture with focus on backend development fundamentals.

work.title: Senior Backend Engineer
work.description: Lead backend architect for a serverless AI deployment platform. Built scalable FastAPI microservices handling 10K+ concurrent deployments. Designed container orchestration pipeline with AWS ECS, implemented dynamic subdomain routing with Traefik proxy, and created GitHub-based CI/CD automation. Optimized database performance and implemented Redis caching for 80% faster response times.

work.title: Backend Software Engineer
work.description: Developed enterprise-level backend systems for an insurance platform.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Backend
projects.description: WebSocket-based chat server with Node.js and Socket.io. Implements message queuing, user presence tracking, and horizontal scaling with Redis pub/sub.

projects.title: URL Shortener API
projects.description: High-performance URL shortening service with analytics. Express.js backend with MongoDB, Redis caching, and comprehensive click tracking and analytics dashboard.

testimonials.text: Rupayan is one of the most proactive and technically gifted engineers I've worked with. His work on FlowScale's container orchestration was game-changing.
He doesn't just write code – he builds scalable systems. Watching Vortyx evolve under his leadership is inspiring.
